verses.text: \w Bel|strong="H1078"\w* boweth \w down|strong="H3766"\w*, \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w* \w stoopeth|strong="H7164"\w*, their \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* were upon the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w*, and upon the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*: your \w carriages|strong="H5385"\w* \add were\add* heavy \w loaden|strong="H6006"\w*; \add they are\add* a \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* to the \w weary|strong="H5889"\w* \add beast\add*.

They \w stoop|strong="H7164"\w*, they bow \w down|strong="H3766"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*; they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* the \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*, but \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* are \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*.\f + \fr 46.2 \ft themselves: Heb. their soul\f*

¶ \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and all the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which are \w borne|strong="H6006"\w* \add by me\add* from the \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*, which are \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* from the \w womb|strong="H7356"\w*:

And \add even\add* to \add your\add* old \w age|strong="H2209"\w* I \add am\add* he; and \add even\add* to hoar \w hairs|strong="H7872"\w* will I \w carry|strong="H5445"\w* \add you:\add* I have \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, and I will \w bear|strong="H5375"\w*; even I will \w carry|strong="H5445"\w*, and will \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* \add you\add*.
¶ To whom will ye \w liken|strong="H1819"\w* me, and make \add me\add* \w equal|strong="H7737"\w*, and \w compare|strong="H4911"\w* me, that we may be \w like|strong="H1819"\w*?

They \w lavish|strong="H2107"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* out of the \w bag|strong="H3599"\w*, and \w weigh|strong="H8254"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* in the \w balance|strong="H7070"\w*, \add and\add* \w hire|strong="H7936"\w* a \w goldsmith|strong="H6884"\w*; and he \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* it a \w god|strong="H0410"\w*: they fall \w down|strong="H5456"\w*, yea, they \w worship|strong="H7812"\w*.

They \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* him upon the \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*, they \w carry|strong="H5445"\w* him, and set him in his \w place|strong="H3240"\w*, and he \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w*; from his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* shall he not \w remove|strong="H4185"\w*: yea, \add one\add* shall \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* unto him, yet can he not \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*, nor \w save|strong="H3467"\w* him out of his \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.
\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* this, and shew yourselves \w men|strong="H0377"\w*: bring \add it\add* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*, O ye \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* the former \w things|strong="H7223"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*: for I \add am\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, and \add there is\add* none else; \add I am\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \add there is\add* \w none|strong="H0657"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* me,

\w Declaring|strong="H5046"\w* the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* from the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w*, and from ancient \w times|strong="H6924"\w* \add the things\add* that are not \add yet\add* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, and I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all my \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w*:

\w Calling|strong="H7121"\w* a ravenous \w bird|strong="H5861"\w* from the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that executeth my \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* from a \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: yea, I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*, I will also \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* it to pass; I have \w purposed|strong="H3335"\w* \add it\add*, I will also \w do|strong="H6213"\w* it.\f + \fr 46.11 \ft that…: Heb. of my counsel\f*
¶ \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, ye \w stouthearted|strong="H0047"\w*, that \add are\add* far \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*:

I bring \w near|strong="H7126"\w* my \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*; it shall not be far \w off|strong="H7368"\w*, and my \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* shall not \w tarry|strong="H0309"\w*: and I will \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* my \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*.
